newsitem.title: USA: Inland Resources completes prfrd redemption.
newsitem.headline: Inland Resources completes prfrd redemption.

text.p: Inland Resources Inc said on Friday it has completed the redemption of its series A preferred stock.
Under the terms of the redemption, the series A holders were given the choice to receive $54.00 per share or convert each preferred share into 9.6726 shares of Inland common stock.
Eighty-seven percent of the series A preferred stockholders elected to convert, causing Inland to issue 813,592 new common shares, the company said.
Inland Resources said it paid $820,962 to redeem the remaining preferred shares.
After the redemption, Inland has 6,275,517 common shares outstanding.
